Article.Title: Here Is The Full Video Of Amazon’s Fire Phone Launch Event
Article.Content: As you probably know, Amazon launched its Fire Phone today. Sadly, the company didn’t make a live stream available, so you had to make do with our live blog. But it really takes video to get a feel for the phone’s main feature — its dynamic perspective 3D mode — but as promised, Amazon has now posted the full video of the event on YouTube and we have embedded it above for your viewing pleasure. This will also give you a chance to see Firefly and all of the phone’s other features in action.
